diagnosis.final_diagnosis: uncomplicated acute diverticulitis with sigmoid microperforation
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with severe abdominal pain, radiating to the anus, along with nausea and vomiting. CT findings noted diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon with adjacent mild residual soft tissue thickening and extraluminal gas, indicative of an uncomplicated acute diverticulitis with sigmoid microperforation.
